comments:
Description: NullPointerException is thrown out when deleting a data source in 
library file.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a data source and related data set in a library file.
2. Delete this data source.
3. Hint message pops up and click on "OK".
4. The data source disappears.
5. I want to undo delete and found that NullPointerException is thrown out.
